io.wcm.qa.glnm.sampling.transform.base

Class RegexGroupBasedSampler<S extends Sampler<String>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.wcm.qa.glnm.sampling.base.CachingBasedSampler<O>
      • io.wcm.qa.glnm.sampling.transform.base.TransformationBasedSampler<S,String,O>
        • io.wcm.qa.glnm.sampling.transform.base.RegexBasedSampler<S,Collection<String>>
          • io.wcm.qa.glnm.sampling.transform.base.RegexGroupBasedSampler<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - type of input sampler
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CachingSampler<Collection<String>>, CanCache, Sampler<Collection<String>>, TransformingSampler<S,String,Collection<String>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RegexGroupSampler, RegexMatchGroupSampler

    public abstract class RegexGroupBasedSampler<S extends Sampler<String>>
extends RegexBasedSampler<S,Collection<String>>
    Abstract base class for implementations extracting groups from a string based on regular expression.
    Since:
    1.0.0
